name: places/ChIJp-iTZQRZwokRbS7-NaH2Vlg
formattedAddress: 176 Lafayette St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 176 Lafayette St, New York, NY 10013-3236, USA

originalText.text:
The women who work here are so friendly & my clothes always come back clean (smelling so good!) and are folded nicely! They are also extremely prompt and often finish my laundry early, even for same day pickup!

The wash & fold prices are very reasonable too– as of writing this review it costs $13 for any load up to 10lbs, and each additional pound over 10lbs is an extra $1.30 (eg, a 15lb load will cost around $20).

There is a $20 minimum for credit cards, so you will need cash for smaller loads, but there's an ATM outside that you can use. They also give you the option to pay when you drop off your laundry or pay when you pick it up!

originalText.text: Picked this laundromat because it was close to our hotel and did same day wash and fold. It was very easy to drop off and pick up. Our laundry was done quickly, and the ladies working were super nice!

text.text: Picked this laundromat because it was close to our hotel and did same day wash and fold. It was very easy to drop off and pick up. Our laundry was done quickly, and the ladies working were super nice!

originalText.text: Been bringing my clothes for wash and fold and dry cleaning here for two years. Never had any issues. Staff is super nice, patient, and clothes come back supreme.

text.text: Been bringing my clothes for wash and fold and dry cleaning here for two years. Never had any issues. Staff is super nice, patient, and clothes come back supreme.

originalText.text:
This place was my first time ever using a wash and fold service and I’ve been coming back for almost two years! This place is seriously a gem - the ladies are super friendly, my clothes are always perfectly folded and smell fresh, and they’re happy to separate whites or bedding whenever I ask. The turnaround is quick and prices are reasonable! I’m so sad that I’m moving away from the area and won’t be coming to them anymore. Please support this amazing local business!

PS. They used to have a previous Google listing with sooo many more positive reviews. Looks like they lost it and had to get it reinstated… trust me when I say this place is the best!

originalText.text: I have been coming to Daily Bubble for years, walking past many other laundromats. The ladies who work here are professional and kind, I have never had a problem with service in over 3 years of weekly visits. They recently lost their business listing on Google Maps, but their past one was over 4.5 stars, filled with years of positive reviews. I highly encourage you to come to this laundromat for your needs
